commit.message:
Auto merge of #62805 - Xanewok:update-rls, r=Xanewok

Update RLS and Rustfmt

Supersedes https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/62537.
Closes #62803.

Fixes fallout after https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/62679.

r? @ghost
